00033 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Constructor: uvm_objection
00035 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 uvm_objection::uvm_objection() :
00037     uvm_object(),
00038     m_hier_mode(true)
00039 {
00040     puvm_objection_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00041 
00042     top = uvm_get_top();
00043     m_raise_event_p = new sc_event();
00044 
00045     p_callback_agent = new uvm_objection_callback_agent();
00046     _callback_map[RAISED] = p_callback_agent;
00047 
00048     p_callback_agent = new uvm_objection_callback_agent();
00049     _callback_map[DROPPED] = p_callback_agent;
00050 
00051     p_callback_agent = new uvm_objection_callback_agent();
00052     _callback_map[ALL_DROPPED] = p_callback_agent;
00053 
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 // Destructor: uvm_objection
00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 uvm_objection::~uvm_objection()
00061 {
00062     _callback_map.clear();    
00063 }

00065 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 // Function: m_get_parent
00067 //   Internal method for getting the parent of the given ~object~.
00068 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 uvm_component* uvm_objection::m_get_parent(uvm_component* comp)
00070 {
00071     if (comp != NULL)
00072       comp = comp->get_parent();
00073     else
00074       comp = top;
00075 
00076     return comp;
00077 }

00080 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // Function: m_propagate
00082 //   Propagate the objection to the objects parent. If the object is a
00083 //   component, the parent is just the hierarchical parent.
00084 //
00085 // Parameter:
00086 //   comp : the uvm_component on which the objection is being raised or lowered
00087 //   source_comp : the root object on which the } user raised/lowered the 
00088 //                 objection (as opposed to an anscestor of the } user object)
00089 //   count : the number of objections associated with the action.
00090 //   raise : indicator of whether the objection is being raised or lowered. A
00091 //           1 indicates the objection is being raised.
00092 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 void uvm_objection::m_propagate (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count, bool raise)
00094 {
00095     if (comp != NULL && comp != top)
00096     {
00097         comp = m_get_parent(comp);
00098         if(raise)
00099             m_raise(comp, source_comp, count);
00100         else
00101             m_drop(comp, source_comp, count);
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 // Function: m_set_hier_mode
00108 //   Hierarchical mode only needs to be set for intermediate components, not
00109 //   for uvm_root or a leaf component.
00110 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void uvm_objection::m_set_hier_mode (uvm_component* comp)
00112 {
00113     if ((m_hier_mode == true) || (comp == top))
00114         return;                             // Don't set if already set or the object is uvm_top.
00115 
00116     if (comp != NULL)
00117     {
00118         if(comp->get_num_children() == 0)   // Don't set if object is a leaf.
00119             return;
00120     }
00121     else
00122     {
00123         return;                             // Don't set if object is a non-component.
00124     }
00125 
00126     // restore counts on non-source nodes
00127     m_total_count.clear();
00128     std::map<uvm_component*, int>::const_iterator source_count_it;
00129 
00130     for (source_count_it = m_source_count.begin(); source_count_it != m_source_count.end(); ++source_count_it)
00131     {
00132         uvm_component* theobj = source_count_it->first;
00133         int         count  = m_source_count[comp];
00134         do 
00135         {
00136             if (m_total_count.count(theobj) != 0)
00137                 m_total_count[theobj] += count;
00138             else
00139                 m_total_count[theobj] = count;
00140             theobj = m_get_parent(theobj);
00141 
00142         } while (theobj != NULL);
00143     }
00144 
00145         m_hier_mode = true;
00146 }
00147 
00148 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 // Function: raise_objection
00150 //   Raises the number of objections for the source ~object~ by ~count~, which
00151 //   defaults to 1.  The ~object~ is usually the ~this~ handle of the caller.
00152 //   If ~object~ is not specified or NULL, the top-level component,
00153 //   is chosen.
00154 //   Rasing an objection causes the following.
00155 //   - The source and total objection counts for ~object~ are increased by
00156 //     ~count~.
00157 //   - The objection's <raised> virtual method is called, which calls the
00158 //     <uvm_component::raised> method for all of the components up the 
00159 //     hierarchy.
00160 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 void uvm_objection::raise_objection (uvm_component* comp, int count)
00162 {
00163     m_raise (comp, comp, count);
00164     if (count > 0)
00165         m_raise_event_p->notify();
00166 
00167     // Execute raised call back
00168     puvm_objection_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00169     p_callback_agent = _callback_map[RAISED];
00170     p_callback_agent->notify(this);
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 // Function: m_raise
00176 //  Internal raise function
00177 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 void uvm_objection::m_raise (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00179 {
00180     if (comp == NULL)
00181         comp = top;
00182 
00183     if (m_total_count.count(comp) != 0)
00184         m_total_count[comp] += count;
00185     else 
00186         m_total_count[comp] = count;
00187 
00188     if (source_comp == comp) 
00189     {
00190         if (m_source_count.count(comp) != 0)
00191             m_source_count[comp] += count;
00192         else
00193             m_source_count[comp] = count;
00194 
00195         source_comp = comp;
00196     }
00197 
00198     raised(comp, source_comp, count);
00199 
00200     // If this object is still draining from a previous drop, then
00201     // raise the count and return. Any propagation will be handled
00202     // by the drain process.
00203     if (m_draining.count(comp) != 0)
00204         return;
00205 
00206     if (!m_hier_mode && comp != top)
00207         m_raise(top,source_comp,count);
00208     else if (comp != top)
00209         m_propagate(comp, source_comp, count, 1);
00210 
00211 }
00212   
00213 
00214 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 // Function: drop_objection
00216 //   Drops the number of objections for the source ~object~ by ~count~, which
00217 //   defaults to 1.  The ~object~ is usually the ~this~ handle of the caller.
00218 //   If ~object~ is not specified or NULL, the implicit top-level component,
00219 //   ~uvm_top~, is chosen.
00220 //
00221 //   Dropping an objection causes the following.
00222 //   - The source and total objection counts for ~object~ are decreased by
00223 //     ~count~. It is an error to drop the objection count for ~object~ below
00224 //     zero.
00225 //   - The objection's <dropped> virtual method is called, which calls the
00226 //     <uvm_component::dropped> method for all of the components up the 
00227 //     hierarchy.
00228 //   - If the total objection count has not reached zero for ~object~, then
00229 //     the drop is propagated up the object hierarchy as with
00230 //     <raise_objection>. Then, each object in the hierarchy will have updated
00231 //     their ~source~ counts--objections that they originated--and ~total~
00232 //     counts--the total number of objections by them and all their
00233 //     desc}ants.
00234 //
00235 //   If the total objection count reaches zero, propagation up the hierarchy
00236 //   is deferred until a configurable drain-time has passed and the 
00237 //   <uvm_component::all_dropped> callback for the current hierarchy level
00238 //   has returned. The following process occurs for each instance up
00239 //   the hierarchy from the source caller:
00240 //
00241 //   A process is forked in a non-blocking fashion, allowing the ~drop~
00242 //   call to return. The forked process then does the following:
00243 //
00244 //   - If a drain time was set for the given ~object~, the process waits for
00245 //     that amount of time.
00246 //
00247 //   - The objection's <all_dropped> virtual method is called, which calls the
00248 //     <uvm_component::all_dropped> method (if ~object~ is a component).
00249 //
00250 //   - The process then waits for the ~all_dropped~ callback to complete.
00251 //
00252 //   - After the drain time has elapsed and all_dropped callback has
00253 //     completed, propagation of the dropped objection to the parent proceeds
00254 //     as described in <raise_objection>, except as described below.
00255 //
00256 //   If a new objection for this ~object~ or any of its desc}ents is raised
00257 //   during the drain time or during execution of the all_dropped callback at
00258 //   any point, the hierarchical chain described above is terminated and the
00259 //   dropped callback does not go up the hierarchy. The raised objection will
00260 //   propagate up the hierarchy, but the number of raised propagated up is
00261 //   reduced by the number of drops that were p}ing waiting for the 
00262 //   all_dropped/drain time completion. Thus, if exactly one objection
00263 //   caused the count to go to zero, and during the drain exactly one new
00264 //   objection comes in, no raises or drops are propagted up the hierarchy,
00265 //
00266 //   As an optimization, if the ~object~ has no set drain-time and no
00267 //   registered callbacks, the forked process can be skipped and propagation
00268 //   proceeds immediately to the parent as described. 
00269 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00270 void uvm_objection::drop_objection (uvm_component* comp, int count)
00271 {
00272     m_drop (comp, comp, count);
00273 
00274     // Execute dropped call back
00275     puvm_objection_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00276     p_callback_agent = _callback_map[DROPPED];
00277     p_callback_agent->notify(this);
00278 }
00279 
00280 
00281 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00282 // Function: m_drop
00283 //  Internal drop function.
00284 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00285 void uvm_objection::m_drop (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00286 {
00287     if (comp == NULL)
00288         comp = top;
00289 
00290     if (!m_total_count.count(comp) || (count > m_total_count[comp])) 
00291     {
00292         cerr << "Object " <<  comp->name() << " attempted to drop objection count below zero." << endl;
00293         exit(1);;
00294     }
00295 
00296     if ((comp == source_comp) && 
00297         (!m_source_count.count(comp) || (count > m_source_count[comp]))) 
00298     {
00299         cerr << "Object " <<  comp->name() << " attempted to drop objection count below zero." << endl;
00300         exit(1);;
00301     }
00302 
00303     m_total_count[comp] -= count;
00304 
00305     if (source_comp == comp) 
00306     {
00307         m_source_count[comp] -= count;
00308         source_comp = comp;
00309     }
00310 
00311 
00312     dropped(comp, source_comp, count);
00313 
00314     // if count != 0, no reason to fork
00315     if (m_total_count[comp] != 0) 
00316     {
00317         if (!m_hier_mode && comp != top)
00318             m_drop(top,source_comp,count);
00319         else if (comp != top)
00320             m_propagate(comp, source_comp, count, 0);
00321 
00322     }
00323     else 
00324     {
00325         m_draining[comp] = 1;
00326         sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_objection::m_process_drain_time, this, comp, source_comp, count));
00327     }
00328 
00329 }   // m_drop
00330 
00331 void uvm_objection::m_process_drain_time (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00332 {
00333     int  diff_count;
00334     bool reraise;
00335     sc_process_handle wait_drain_time_h;
00336 
00337     wait_drain_time_h = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_objection::m_wait_drain_time, this, comp, source_comp, count));
00338     wait(wait_drain_time_h.terminated_event() | *m_raise_event_p);
00339 
00340     if (m_total_count[comp] == 0)
00341         all_dropped(comp,source_comp,count);
00342 
00343 
00344     m_draining.erase(comp);
00345 
00346     diff_count = m_total_count[comp] - count;
00347 
00348     // no propagation if the re-raise cancels the drop
00349     if (diff_count != 0) 
00350     {
00351         reraise = diff_count > 0 ? 1 : 0;
00352 
00353         if (diff_count < 0)
00354             diff_count = -diff_count;
00355 
00356         if (!m_hier_mode && comp != top) 
00357         {
00358             if (reraise)
00359                 m_raise(top,source_comp,diff_count);
00360             else
00361                 m_drop(top,source_comp,diff_count);
00362         }
00363         else
00364         {
00365             if (comp != top) 
00366             {
00367                 m_propagate(comp, source_comp, diff_count, reraise);
00368             }
00369         }
00370     }
00371 }
00372

00374 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00375 // Function: m_wait_drain_time
00376 //  Internal function to wait for drain time.
00377 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00378 void uvm_objection::m_wait_drain_time (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00379 {
00380     if (m_drain_time.count(comp))
00381         wait(m_drain_time[comp]);
00382 }

00385 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00386 // Function: set_drain_time
00387 //   Sets the drain time on the given ~object~ to ~drain~.
00388 //
00389 //   The drain time is the amount of time to wait once all objections have
00390 //   been dropped before calling the all_dropped callback and propagating
00391 //   the objection to the parent. 
00392 //
00393 //   If a new objection for this ~object~ or any of its desc}ents is raised
00394 //   during the drain time or during execution of the all_dropped callbacks,
00395 //   the drain_time/all_dropped execution is terminated. 
00396 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00397 void uvm_objection::set_drain_time (uvm_component* comp, sc_core::sc_time drain)
00398 {
00399     m_drain_time[comp] = drain;
00400     m_set_hier_mode(comp);
00401 }
00402

00404 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00405 // Function: raised
00406 //  Objection callback that is called when a <raise_objection> has reached ~comp~.
00407 //  The default implementation calls <uvm_component::raised>.
00408 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00409 void uvm_objection::raised (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00410 {
00411     if (comp != NULL)
00412         comp->raised(this, source_comp, count);
00413 }
00414 
00415 
00416 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00417 // Function: dropped
00418 //   Objection callback that is called when a <drop_objection> has reached ~comp~.
00419 //   The default implementation calls <uvm_component::dropped>.
00420 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00421 void uvm_objection::dropped (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00422 {
00423     if (comp != NULL)
00424         comp->dropped(this, source_comp, count);
00425 }
00426 
00427 
00428 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00429 // Function: all_dropped
00430 //   Objection callback that is called when a <drop_objection> has reached ~comp~,
00431 //   and the total count for ~comp~ goes to zero. This callback is executed
00432 //   after the drain time associated with ~comp~. The default implementation 
00433 //   calls <uvm_component::all_dropped>.
00434 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00435 void uvm_objection::all_dropped (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00436 {
00437     if (comp != NULL)
00438         comp->all_dropped(this, source_comp, count);
00439 
00440     // Execute all dropped call back
00441     puvm_objection_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00442     p_callback_agent = _callback_map[ALL_DROPPED];
00443     p_callback_agent->notify(this);
00444 }

00449 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00450 // Function: get_objection_count
00451 //   Returns the current number of objections raised by the given ~object~.
00452 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00453 int uvm_objection::get_objection_count (uvm_component* comp)
00454 {
00455     if (!m_source_count.count(comp))
00456         return 0;
00457     return m_source_count[comp];
00458 }
00459   
00460 
00461 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00462 // Function: get_objection_total
00463 //   Returns the current number of objections raised by the given ~object~ 
00464 //   and all descants.
00465 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00466 int uvm_objection::get_objection_total (uvm_component* comp)
00467 {
00468     int                     objection_total = 0;
00469     std::vector<sc_object*> child_vec;
00470 
00471     string ch;
00472 
00473     if (comp == NULL)
00474         comp = top;
00475 
00476     if (!m_total_count.count(comp))
00477         return 0;
00478 
00479     objection_total = m_total_count[comp];
00480 
00481     if( (!m_hier_mode)  && (comp != NULL))
00482     {
00483         uvm_component* child_comp = NULL;
00484         objection_total = m_source_count[comp];
00485         child_vec = comp->get_child_objects();
00486 
00487         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < child_vec.size(); i++)
00488         {
00489             child_comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(child_vec[i]);
00490             if (comp != NULL)
00491             {
00492                 objection_total += get_objection_total(child_comp);
00493             }
00494         }
00495     }
00496 
00497     return objection_total;
00498 }
00499

00501 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00502 // Function: get_drain_time
00503 //   Returns the current drain time set for the given ~object~ (default: 0 ns).
00504 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00505 sc_core::sc_time uvm_objection::get_drain_time (uvm_component* comp)
00506 {
00507     if (!m_drain_time.count(comp))
00508         return SC_ZERO_TIME;
00509 
00510     return m_drain_time[comp];
00511 }

00529 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00530 // Function: qualify
00531 //   Checks that the given ~object~ is derived from either <uvm_component> or
00532 //   <uvm_sequence_base>.
00533 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00534 void uvm_test_done_objection::qualify(bool is_raise, uvm_component* comp)
00535 {
00536     string nm = is_raise ? "raise_objection" : "drop_objection";
00537 
00538     if (comp == NULL)
00539     {
00540         cerr << "A non-hierarchical object '" 
00541              << comp->name() 
00542              << "' (" 
00543              <<  comp->get_type_name() 
00544              << ") was used in a call to uvm_test_done." 
00545              <<  nm 
00546              << "(). For this objection, a sequence or component is required."  
00547              << endl;
00548         exit(1);
00549     }
00550 }
00551 
00552 
00553 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00554 // Function: all_dropped
00555 //   This callback is called when the given ~object's~ objection count reaches
00556 //   zero; if the ~object~ is the implicit top-level, <uvm_top> then it means
00557 //   there are no more objections raised for the ~uvm_test_done~ objection.
00558 //   Thus, after calling <uvm_objection::all_dropped>, this method will call
00559 //   <uvm_stop_request> to stop the current task-based phase (e.g. run).
00560 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00561 void uvm_test_done_objection::all_dropped (uvm_component* comp, uvm_component* source_comp, int count)
00562 {
00563     uvm_objection::all_dropped(comp, source_comp, count);
00564 
00565     if (comp == top) 
00566     {
00567         if (!uvm_manager::get_manager()->is_in_stop_request()) 
00568         {
00569             // Note:  All test objections have been dropped, calling uvm_stop_request() @ << sc_time_stamp() << endl;
00570             uvm::uvm_stop_request();
00571         }
00572         //else 
00573         //{
00574         //    Note:  All test objections have been dropped - already in stop request
00575         //}
00576     }
00577 }
00578 
00579 
00580 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00581 // Function: raise_objection
00582 //   Calls <uvm_objection::raise_objection> after calling <qualify>. 
00583 //   If the ~object~ is not provided or is ~NULL~, then the implicit top-level
00584 //   component, ~uvm_top~, is chosen.
00585 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00586 void uvm_test_done_objection::raise_objection (uvm_component* comp, int count)
00587 {
00588     if(comp == NULL)
00589       comp = top;
00590     else
00591       qualify(true, comp);
00592 
00593     uvm_objection::raise_objection(comp, count);
00594 }
00595 
00596 
00597 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00598 // Function: drop
00599 //   Calls <uvm_objection::drop_objection> after calling <qualify>. 
00600 //   If the ~object~ is not provided or is ~NULL~, then the implicit top-level
00601 //   component, ~uvm_top~, is chosen.
00602 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00603 void uvm_test_done_objection::drop_objection (uvm_component* comp, int count)
00604 {
00605     if(comp == NULL)
00606         comp=top;
00607     else
00608         qualify(false, comp);
00609 
00610     uvm_objection::drop_objection(comp,count);
00611 }
00612

00614 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00615 // Function : get
00616 //   uvm_test_done_objection singleton.
00617 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00618 uvm_test_done_objection* uvm_test_done_objection::get()
00619 {
00620     uvm_object* obj;
00621 
00622     if (m_inst == NULL)
00623     {
00624         obj = uvm::uvm_factory::create_object("uvm_test_done_objection", "top->name()", "uvm_test_done");
00625         m_inst = DCAST<uvm_test_done_objection*>(obj);
00626     }
00627 
00628     return m_inst;
00629 }

00632 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00633 // Function : get_callback_agent()
00634 //   - get a pointer to a particular callback agent
00635 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00636 puvm_objection_callback_agent uvm_objection::get_callback_agent(OBJECTION_ACTION objection_action)
00637 {
00638   return _callback_map[objection_action];
00639 }
